channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by IPSOS PULS for Nova TV, 1–20 August 2018 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Hrvatska demokratska zajednica (EPP): 4–5 seats
  • Socijaldemokratska partija Hrvatske (S&D): 2–3 seats
  • Most nezavisnih lista (*): 1 seats
  • Živi zid (*): 2 seats
  • Hrvatska narodna stranka–liberalni demokrati (ALDE): 0 seats
  • Hrvatska seljačka stranka (EPP): 0–1 seats
  • Bandić Milan 365–Stranka rada i solidarnosti (*): 0 seats
  • Istarski demokratski sabor (ALDE): 0 seats
  • Pametno (ALDE): 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by IPSOS PULS for Nova TV, 1–20 August 2018 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
item.description: TBD

item.title: Opinion Poll by IPSOS PULS for Nova TV, 1–20 August 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Hrvatska demokratska zajednica (EPP): 28.2–34.0%
  • Socijaldemokratska partija Hrvatske (S&D): 16.2–21.1%
  • Most nezavisnih lista (*): 6.4–9.8%
  • Živi zid (*): 12.3–16.7%
  • Hrvatska narodna stranka–liberalni demokrati (ALDE): 0.7–2.1%
  • Hrvatska seljačka stranka (EPP): 3.6–6.3%
  • Bandić Milan 365–Stranka rada i solidarnosti (*): 3.0–5.5%
  • Istarski demokratski sabor (ALDE): 1.7–3.8%
  • Pametno (ALDE): 2.3–4.6%

  • Socijaldemokratska partija Hrvatske (S&D): 20.0–25.4%
  • Most nezavisnih lista (*): 5.8–9.3%
  • Živi zid (*): 11.9–16.5%
  • Hrvatska narodna stranka–liberalni demokrati (ALDE): 1.7–3.8%
  • Hrvatska seljačka stranka (EPP): 1.4–3.4%
  • Bandić Milan 365–Stranka rada i solidarnosti (*): 2.6–5.1%
  • Istarski demokratski sabor (ALDE): 1.8–4.0%
  • Pametno (ALDE): 1.7–3.8%
